import React from 'react'; import logo from './logo.svg'; import './App.css'; import { Row, Col, FormGroup, Label, Input , UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem , Button} from "reactstrap"; class App extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { avatar : "https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif", location : "", email : "", bio : "", profileLink : "", totalRepos : "", followers : "", userName : "British" } this.getUserProfile = this.getUserProfile.bind(this); } getUserProfile() { let user = this.state.userName; fetch('https://developer.github.com/v3/users/:'+user) .then(results => { console.log(results.json()); }) } render() { return (

User Profile
); } } export default App;
